root.name: Scooby-Doo: Phantom of the Knight
root.description: Plot Scooby-Doo and the Gang find themselves in a mysterious medieval castle in Nova Scotia. Soon they discover that the princess has been kidnapped by a scary phantom. Gameplay The player guides the gang through the castle grounds while interacting with random objects, solving puzzles, and hunting for clues. Along the way, the gang meets more characters who offer their own clues but also become suspects in the mystery. By the end of the game, the player must make a determination of who is behind the Black Knight. System Requirements Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista Pentium 166Mhz Processor 32Mb RAM (512MB for Vista) 40mb hard disk space 16 bit 640x480 colour screen 8x speed CD-ROM drive 16 bit sound card Speakers Mouse
